newsitem.title: FINLAND: FINNISH ELECTRONICS INDUSTRY '97 OUTLOOK GOOD - MET.
newsitem.headline: FINNISH ELECTRONICS INDUSTRY '97 OUTLOOK GOOD - MET.

text.p: Prospects are favourable this year for the Finnish electronics industry, the Confederation of Metal, Engineering and Electrotechnical Industries (MET) said in a statement on Tuesday.
"Continued growth is expected in the next few months especially in the electronics industry," MET said.
"Prospects are favourable for the electronics industry for the whole year as well," it said.
Demand for electric and electrotechnical goods was weak, MET said, adding that the budding pick-up in domestic construction activity was expected to boost demand in that sector only in 1998.

In the machinery and metal products industry the business cycle was expected to improve in the second half of 1997. In base metals production, output volumes and prices were expected to develop favourably, MET said.
